description:
My place is close to Numerous stores Lots of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, nail salons and hair salons ect.. all in a 10 block radius from the home. The R train is on 86st and 4th ave.  Towels, toilet paper, napkins, heat ect.. will be supplied for you.My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).If you have any complaints go down to apt 1 and ask for Luis Vasquez or Joseph Castano.

The Price will change depending on how much people come.
name: Bay Ridge Apt
review: Luis is very helpful and available at all times. The area is wonderful and the apartment was very clean.
